description: Defines a custom web component 'todo-topbar' for a Todo MVC application, managing the top bar UI including item counts, toggle all, and adding new items.

classes.name: TodoTopbar
classes.description: A custom HTML element managing the top bar of a Todo list, handling display updates, event listeners, and user interactions.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Dispatches a 'toggle-all' event with the completed status based on the toggle input.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Dispatches an 'add-item' event with a new item's id, title, and completion status.

methods.name: updateDisplay
methods.description: Updates the toggle input and container visibility based on current item counts and route.

methods.name: updateRoute
methods.description: Sets the current route and updates the display accordingly.

methods.name: addListeners
methods.description: Adds event listeners for toggle input and key listeners.

methods.name: removeListeners
methods.description: Removes event listeners for toggle input and key listeners.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles attribute changes and updates display if connected.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Initializes key listeners, updates display, adds event listeners, and focuses input when component is added to DOM.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Removes event listeners and clears key listeners when component is removed from DOM.
